name: Sus Run
description:
For this project we had to create a 2d platformer with 3 significant changes,

My changes were

1. Made a chasing mechanic where you have one life to complete the level while a picture of jerma is chasing you and will kill you in 1 hit

2. I added a endless mode where you try get a high score while 2 jermas go around the map

3. added a spawner for endless mode so score pick ups keep spawning around jerma
